front.title: Encapsulation and Processing of Network Slice Selector in IPv6 Data Plane

abstract.t: Packets belong to a network slice need to be forwarded using the specific network resources. A network slice selector is carried in each packet to identify the network slice that it belongs to. This document proposes a new Network Slice Selector Option, and describes the encapsulation and processing of network slice selector in IPv6 data plane using the proposed option.
